name: Solar Purge
description:
What happens when you combine a twin-stick shooter with an action RPG and a bullet hell? Solar Purge of course! Dive into the action as you destroy everything in your pathway with tons of unique weapons and abilities. Take on the threats of Nova Genesis with up to 4 players and discover the secrets to its ancient past.Campaign
Play through the story mode and discover the secrets of Nova Genesis!Holo - Chamber
Jump straight into the action in procedurally generated missions.4 Playable Character Classes
Choose the hero that fits your play-style!



Engineer - Build bots, tech and tools to heal and support your squad!

Juggernaut - Protect your squad at all costs. Use shields and defensive skills to keep your enemies at bay!

Stryker - Pull out the heavy firepower and decimate all who oppose you!

Assassin - Sneak behind enemies and attack from the shadows. Move quickly and attack powerfully!Skills & Upgrades
Level up each of your characters and upgrade their skills. Killing enemies and completing missions rewards you with new weapons and loot.4 Player Couch Co-op
Get the squad together! Play with up to 4 friends and take on the Campaign or Procedural Missions!
*Xbox Controller RecommendedEpic Sci-Fi Universe
Built with Unreal Engine 4, the world of Solar Purge comes to life with breathtaking visuals and an original soundtrack!
